name: The Normandy Orchard Chateau
description:
DESCRIPTION
The castle was built in 1903, close to Gisors one the most beautiful historic town of Normandy. The first occuppant of the castle was the family of the comtessa of Miremont. The Château team welcomes you to its superb building and provides you with full privatization of the latter in order to offer you an unforgettable event. You will savor with pleasure the hospitality and savoir vivre of the owners and enter the secret garden of this establishment.
For the most beautiful day of your life, live the life of a castle by celebrating your union at the Château. This prestigious building opens the doors to its domain in Seine Maritime, so that you can spend an unforgettable evening surrounded by your family and friends. You will find a completely restored mansion, in a restful environment. You will have the opportunity to visit the city of Gisors, to ride bycicle around.
The domain also has a huge 18ha garden and orchard of over 300 fruit trees you will taste during your vacation, and creates a perfect setting for an outdoor cocktail reception that stands this historic castle from 1862. Erected on a promontory, this monument reveals a 360º view of the furrows of greenery. Invite your loved ones to an unforgettable mid-committee dinner in the reception rooms bathed in light and opening onto the park, with a total area of 100m2, extended by a terrace.
Extend this timeless moment over the course of one night or several days by enjoying all the comfort offered by the five rooms, including two suites of the castle, and recover from your emotions accompanied by those who are dear to you. We have four stunning bedrooms that each have a king size bed, we also have a family suite which sleeps 4-5 guests. In total we can cater for 13 guests within the Chateau.
The Château team welcomes you to its superb building and provides you with full privatization of the Chateau in order to offer you an unforgettable event. You will savor with pleasure the hospitality and savoir vivre of the owners and enter the secret garden of this establishment. Whether it is a wedding, vow renewal or anniversary celebration we are here to help and make your event hassle free.
Price from 2425 euros for one day exclusive hire of the venue, gardens and accomodation. Breakfast can also be added for 15 euros per person.
The estate is located 20 kilometers from Beauvais airport, 70 kilometers from Roissy-Charles de Gaulle airport and 100 kilometers from Paris.
